## IdentityManager.identityManagerAddKey() method

Adds a key to a DID Document

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
identityManagerAddKey({ did, key, options }: IIdentityManagerAddKeyArgs, context: IAgentContext<IKeyManager>): Promise<any>;
```
